game.title: **!kick**
game.description:
- Kick a player as a temporary punishment or warning.
- You must specify a player number **!kick #3**

game.title: **!tempban**
game.description:
- Bans a player temporarily.
- You must specify a player number, the time and a reason
- Example usage: **!tempban #3 60d8h20m flying and no knockback** bans #3 for 60 days 8 hours and 20 minutes.

game.title: **!ban**
game.description:
- Bans a player permanently.
- You must specify a player number and a reason
- Example usage: **!ban #3 flying and no knockback**

game.title: **!kill**
game.description:
- Kills a player as a form of punishment. **Keep in mind, killed player will respawn next round**. Only use it when a player is in a 1v1.
- This command is best for killing yourself so you can spectate for cheaters.
- You must specify a player number **!kill #3**

game.title: **!respawn**
game.description:
- Respawn yourself. **Only woks until next round** if player died in normal gameplay (fell in water, blew up etc). Player can respawn and play next round if !kill command was used to kill them.
- You can respawn another player by specifying a player number **!respawn #3**

game.title: **!bc**
game.description:
- (__Broadcast__ __chat__) Sends a server message
- Example usage: **!bc DO NOT ABUSE THE REPORT COMMAND**

game.title: **!start**
game.description: - Starts the game **MUST ONLY BE USED IN LOBBY**

game.title: **!mute**
game.description:
- Mutes a player in text chat for a specified time.
- Example usage: **!mute #3 5m30s** mutes #3 5 minutes 30 seconds.

game.title: **!unmute**
game.description:
- Unmutes a player in text chat.
- Example usage: **!unmute #3** unmutes #3

game.title: **!chaos**
game.description: - Toggles the chaos game mode setting on or off.

game.title: **!giveweapon** / **!gw**
game.description:
- Places weapon in player's inventory for free by ID or name. Player ID is optional.
- Example usage: **!giveweapon #3 ak** or **!gw 0**

game.title: **!dropweapon** / **!dw**
game.description:
- Drops weapon for free by ID or name. Player ID is optional.
- Example usage: **!dropweapon #3 ak** or **!dw 0**

discord.title: **{prefix}cmd**
discord.description:
- Executes a command on any of our servers.
- You must specify a server ('chaos', 'default', 'race', 'tag', 'custom', 'all') and a command
- Example usage: **{prefix}cmd chaos {prefix}ban #3 flying and no knockback**

discord.title: **{prefix}start**
discord.description:
- Starts your server + watchdog process.
- You must specify a server to start ('chaos', 'default', 'race', 'tag', 'custom')
- Example usage: **{prefix}start chaos**

discord.title: **{prefix}stop**
discord.description:
- Stops your server + watchdog process.
- You must specify a server to stop ('chaos', 'default', 'race', 'tag', 'custom')
- Example usage: **{prefix}stop chaos**

discord.title: **{prefix}restart**
discord.description:
- Restarts one of our game servers.
- You must specify a server to restart ('chaos', 'default', 'race', 'tag', 'custom')
- Example usage: **{prefix}restart chaos**

discord.title: **{prefix}discordinvite**
discord.description:
- Updates the discord invite code that will show in game.
- Example usage: **{prefix}discordinvite <https://discord.gg/ccgm> **

discord.title: **{prefix}unban**
discord.description:
- Unbans a player. You must specify a profileurl / steamid64 and a reason
- Example usage: **{prefix}unban <https://steamcommunity.com/id/harpy_eagle/> didn't mean to ban them**

discord.title: **{prefix}ban**
discord.description:
- Bans a player by profileurl / steamid64 (whether they're in game or not). You must specify a profileurl / steamid64 and a reason
- Example usage: **{prefix}ban <https://steamcommunity.com/id/harpy_eagle/> flying and god mode**

discord.title: **{prefix}baninfo**
discord.description:
- Lookup a player's ban information by profileurl / steamid64. You must specify a profileurl / steamid64
- Example usage: **{prefix}baninfo <https://steamcommunity.com/id/harpy_eagle/>**

discord.title: **{prefix}playerinfo**
discord.description:
- Lookup a player's information. You must specify a profileurl / steamid64
- Example usage: **{prefix}playerinfo <https://steamcommunity.com/id/harpy_eagle/>**

discord.title: **{prefix}permset**
discord.description:
- Set a player's perms.
- Must specify a profileurl / steamid64 and (user, moderator or admin).
- Example usage: **{prefix}permset <https://steamcommunity.com/id/harpy_eagle/> admin**

discord.title: **{prefix}steamid**
discord.description:
- Gets a player's steamID64.
- Must specify a profileurl.
- Example usage: **{prefix}steamid <https://steamcommunity.com/id/harpy_eagle/>**

discord.title: **{prefix}sync**
discord.description: - Tells Discord to load / reload your slash commands
